item.title: Dropdown/Scratchpad Terminals with i3
item.description: This tutorial provides a step-by-step guide on how to implement dropdown terminals in i3 using the scratchpad feature. The tutorial includes examples of how the dropdown terminals can be used and provides a detailed explanation of the necessary i3 configuration and accompanying script.
